title: Neglected solid phase pentavalent plutonium carbonate in the environment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00283K, Paper
Anastasiia S. Kuzenkova, Tatiana V. Plakhova, Roman D. Svetogorov, Elizaveta S. Kulikova, Alexander L. Trigub, Vasily O. Yapaskurt, Alexander V. Egorov, Andrey S. Toropov, Alexey A. Averin, Maria D. Shaulskaya, Dmitry M. Tsymbarenko, Anna Yu. Romanchuk, Stepan N. Kalmykov
KPuO2CO3 solid phase precipitation from hexavalent plutonium solution: structure and stability area.
